songs.title: Hit It In The Morning
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Can I hit it in the morning?
All of my niggas steady snoring
While we still drunk off some Patron and
Baby easy on the moaning

Can I hit it in the morning?
All of my niggas steady snoring
Baby easy on the moaning
Let me get up in my zone and

Can I hit in the morning?
All of my niggas steady snoring
Baby easy on the moaning
Let me get up in my zone and can I hit it in the


[Verse 2]
Can I hit it the morning?
Still feels like its nighttime
Move a little to the left
I wait until the right time
All my niggas dead asleep
We up in the AM
I know it's hard to keep the silence
But who's really saying ooooh baby
I know you really wanna say ooooh baby
